name: ESCAPE FROM THE 3D WORLD
description:
The exhibition-turned-final build of "Escape From the 3D World"! 

Play as Daisy Strum, and find all the ways that you can make it to a higher plane of existence, or die trying. 

It's "gone home" meets your-mom's-eccentric-friend-who-smells-like-a-weird-plant-core. 

You'll either love it, or you probably just aren't vibrating on the right plane to know what's good for ya. 

This edition includes:

-  More deaths (take that, atheists!)

-  More actions (try doing stuff!)

-  New characters (hello, frens!)

-  Lots of stuff to see! (eyeballs rejoice!)

Huge thanks to the new friends I made in ENL187 and Professor Boluk for making this class an absolute blast!
